column4: grrr ok here's where the score with my webcam stands. i could get xawtv to work but it wont save to a file. i could get vlc to work except for the pcm error whiuch i presume is related to a sound input issue and i can take snapshots with webcamsudio but i cant get it tyo export to a file or website. can someone please help me with this?
